## 4. Severity Assessment (APEX Standard)

How critical is this failure to the core functionality?

- [ ] **S1: Catastrophic Failure** (Data loss, application crash, core feature unusable)
- [ ] **S2: Major Degradation** (Significant feature impairment, major UI/UX defect)
- [ ] **S3: Minor Issue** (Non-critical functionality error, minor visual glitch)
- [ ] **S4: Suggestion/Documentation** (Not a bug, but an improvement)
